A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Umm wow.  Ok don't listen to all the nonsense of would-be home critics here.  I had expectations going into this movie with some predictions of expanded universe.   Not only was I really wrong\, but I was pleasantly surprised.   Few plot twists\, humor\, grand scenes and spare no expense on character direction....  Anyway\, if you go in expecting another rehash of the old movies\, forget it.   Questions hang and they do a good job keeping you wanting to see what happens next.
